name: Robert
introduction: Greetings! I’m Robert, a 58-year-old retired architect with a lifelong love for design and architecture. Now that I have more time on my hands, I’m exploring new hobbies, traveling, and enjoying the simple joys of life. I’m a family man at heart, with a dry sense of humor and a passion for history. Looking to connect with interesting people who appreciate the wisdom that comes with age and the excitement of new adventures. Let’s share stories and see where the journey takes us! 🏛️🚘
